entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:06 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Rain beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
